patthana15.81:1.1_0: Araṇaṁ parittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naparitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.81:2.1_0: Araṇaṁ mahaggataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo namahaggato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.81:3.1_0: Araṇaṁ appamāṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naappamāṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
